# INConditionalOperator.all

**Case**

All relevant attributes must be present for the search to yield a match. This is equivalent to an AND operator.

## Declaration

```swift
case all
```

## Constants

- **INConditionalOperator.any**: One or more of the relevant attributes must be present for the search to yield a match. This is equivalent to an OR operator.
- **INConditionalOperator.none**: None of the specified attributes must be present for the search to yield a match.
